_sText:
DE_TEGEA_CSS_FINAL in essence it's a capital re-build of the prerevious version this map named [DE_TEGEA_S](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/17179) (known also under the name DE_TEGEA_FINAL) released October 2006. It was an first author's remake of popular map for classical Counter-Strike [DE_TEGEA](http://cs.gamebanana.com/maps/157794) by 3DPunk (released December 2001).

DE_TEGEA_CSS_FINAL was released May 2007, and included a set of changes (redesigned, added or deleted some locations) and improvements (overall textures and lightnings replacements) in comparison with the previous version.

DE_TEGEA_CSS_FINAL is an office-styled map which for 80% consists of indoor locations, and also is very friendly for intense closed fights and stealth actions.

GENERAL CREDITS & GRATITUDES:
3DPunk (for very popular release for classic CS),
MayheM (for beautyful office/industrial themed remake for CS:S),
BarnDoor (for good playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps).

Play and Enjoy :-)

- - - - - - - - - - - -

**ABOUT PLAYING WITH BOTS:**

In archive with the original map included the more or less playable .nav-file (Navigation Mesh for playing with Bots) optimized by [Peter 'BarnDoor' Calvert](http://www.tequilakawa.plus.com/) for use on public and private servers. "This nav was placepainted already, I assume by the map author, and I've maintained this. Nearly all the ladders didn't work, and one of the main routes from TSpawn wasn't connected, so there is a significant difference in bot behaviour on this edit." Still quite recently it was the best of all available nav-files for this map, but it was not perfect playable :-(

Therefore [**here**](http://css.gamebanana.com/gamefiles/3488) is available for downloading a manually optimized and fully place painted NAV-file for this Great map!
